name: Mouse Recorder File
summary: An MRF file is a data file created by Bartels Media Mouse Recorder, a program used to record mouse and keyboard activity that can be played back. It contains a recorded macro , which may include mouse actions, keyboard input, and wait time between mouse actions. MRF files are used to help automate the actions of a computer user to save time when performing repetitive tasks.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
